title: Disconnect from PvP.net due to Hextech Crafting
body: So whenever I would go to open crates that i had purchased, i would get in and press unlock on my first chest/crate and it would open and give me nothing, disconnect me from PvP.net and say that the crafting was unsuccessful and i should try later. I can play games just fine and access the store but as soon as it comes to hextech crafting i get disconnected. anyone help?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've been asked to have you and anyone else experiencing this issue submit logs and a ticket regarding it.

You'll have to download the [Hextech Toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi) for me, select your region and run it with the default settings.

Your logs should be saved to your Desktop as LoL-Logs.zip, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) describing your error to Player Support and attach that file with your ticket to ensure support receives all necessary information.

Save issue here. There were quite a few threads on this topic, but no real solution has been found. I even tried it on a fresh Windows install and still getting the same issues, I think it's a problem server side.
Yeah i agree, I think it's a server issue aswell, because i can play games perfectly fine but when it comes to crafting, it doesnt want to co-operate at all. :/ thanks for letting me know though!
